author: fhanik
msg: Made the runsamples.bat script work properly for windows,
1. change forward slash to backslash for paths
2. correct the path for antlr.lib, it doesn't sit in the lib directory of the 2.7.7 antlr distribution
3. dont set and reset the global CLASSPATH variable, it grows the variable value over time with redundant paths
4. remove the usage of the global CLASSPATH variable, no need to rely on this, everything is local
5. add the javasspl-samples jar file to the classpath
